document: DOT AND STRIPE ARRAYS AS SURFACE ACOUSTIC WAVE REFLECTORS: A Thesis for the Degree of Doctor of Philosophy by ANDREW STOVE, St. Catherine's College. Michaelmas 1980. "Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth, the "first heaven and the first earth had disappeared "now, and there was no longer any sea." Revelation of St.John the Divine, 21:1.
